Waypoint.action: --## BANK ##-- npctalk("hi","deposit all","yes","balance")
--## LOC CHECK ##-- if not islocation() then gotolabel("#004") end

--## DEPOSITER ##-- reopenbps({_getid(MainBP), "back"}, {_getid(LootBP), MainBP, true}) wait(1000,1200) opendepot("depot") wait(1000,1200) deposititems(LootBP, 1, 2) wait(1000,1200) closecontainers() wait(1000,1200) reopenbps({_getid(MainBP), "back"}, { _getid(LootBP), MainBP, true}, { _getid(MiscBP), MainBP, true}, { _getid(AmmoBP), MainBP, true}) wait(1000,1200) opendepot(DepotWithAva) wait(200,400) withdrawitems(getdepotboxnamefromindex(DepotWithAva), {{id = 3161, uptocount = AvalancheToTakeFromDP, dest = AvalancheBP}}) wait(200,400) closecontainer(getcontainer(getdepotboxidfromindex(DepotWithAva)).id) wait(800,1000) openquiver()
--## LOC CHECK ##-- if not islocation() then gotolabel("#008") end
--## LOC CHECK ##-- if not islocation() then gotolabel("#011") end
--## BUY AMMO ##-- wait(300,500) npctalk("hi", "trade") wait(300,500) buyitemsupto(_getid(Ammo), AmmoToBuy) wait(300,500)
--## LOC CHECK ##-- if not islocation() then gotolabel("#015") end
--## LOC CHECK ##-- if not islocation() then gotolabel("#018") end

--## BUY POTS & LOC CHECK ##-- if not islocation() then gotolabel("#020") else --## MANA SHOP ##-- npctalk("hi","trade") wait(400,800) sellflasks() wait(400,800) buyitemsupto(_getid("ultimate spirit potion"), HPToBuy) wait(400,800) buyitemsupto(_getid("great mana potion"), MPToBuy) wait(400,800) end
--## LOC CHECK ##-- if not islocation() then gotolabel("#022") end

--## LOC CHECK ##-- if not islocation() then gotolabel("#024") end --## SUPPLY CHECK ##-- if (countitems(_getid(MP)) < MPToBuy-10) or (countitems(_getid(HP)) < HPToBuy-10) or (cap() < CapToLeave) or (countitems(_getid(Ammo)) < AmmoToBuy) or (countitems(_getid("Avalanche Rune")) < AvalancheToTakeFromDP) then gotolabel("START EDRON DP") end

--## LOC CHECK ##--
if not islocation() then gotolabel("#023") end
Waypoint.label: Loc6

Waypoint.action:
--## FLOOR CHECK ##--
if GoLastFloor == true then gotolabel("#061") else gotolabel("EnterTP") end
Waypoint.label: CheckGoLastFloor

Waypoint.action:
--## LOC&SUPP CHECK ##--
if (countitems(_getid(MP)) < MPToLeave) or (countitems(_getid(HP)) < HPToLeave) or (cap() < CapToLeave) then gotolabel("EnterTP") end
Waypoint.label: SuppCheck

Waypoint.action:
--## RETURN HUNT ##--
gotolabel("StartHunt")

--## LOC CHECK ##--
if not islocation() then gotolabel("#089") end

Script.content:
--## SCRIPT CONFIG ##--
--## BP'S ##-- MainBP = "golden backpack" -- with rope shovel etc. LootBP = "red backpack" -- for loot MiscBP = "blue backpack" -- potions AmmoBP = "beach backpack" -- ammunition AvalancheBP = "blue backpack" -- avalanche runes QuiverName = "Quiver" -- quiver on shield slot
--## HUNT ##-- GoLastFloor = true CapToLeave = 100 MPToLeave = 150 HPToLeave = 20 AmmoToLeave = 300 CapToDropVial = 500 AvalancheToLeave = 50
--## POTIONS & AMMO ##-- MP = "great mana potion" MPToBuy = 900 HP = "ultimate spirit potion" HPToBuy = 100 AmmoToBuy = 1100 Ammo = "diamond arrow" AvalancheToTakeFromDP = 300 DepotWithAva = 4
auto(15000,20000) if cap() < CapToDropVial then dropitems(283,countitems(283)) wait(200, 400) dropitems(284,countitems(284)) wait(200, 400) dropitems(285,countitems(285)) wait(200, 400) end
auto(2000) if maround(2, MonstersTable) < 1 and not ishasted() and not ispzone() then talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_SAY, 'utani hur') wait(200) end
auto(200) if isparalysed() then talk(MESSAGE_TYPE_SAY, 'utani hur') wait(200) end
auto(1000, 1500) local weaponid = _getid(Ammo) local countinquiver = countitems(_getid(Ammo), QuiverName) if countitems(weaponid) > 0 and countinquiver < 200 then equipobject(weaponid, 5) end

TargetRule.label: Main
TargetRule.Name: Vampire Viscount, Vampire Bride, Bonebeast, Vampire, Necromancer

TargetRule.label: Less
TargetRule.Name: Demon Skeleton, Ghoul, Skeleton Warrior, Necromancer
